gameDetails.name: Louis XIV: The Favourite
gameDetails.description:
The Favourite expansion includes 4 Favourite Tablets and a Favourite figure.

Each player takes a Favourite tablet and put it in front of him, in view of every player. Then each player takes one influence marker from the general supply and places it on one of the 4 space of his Favourite tablet.

This expansion has not been released separately, but can be found in the Treasure Chest.
